data.title: Shanghai Court Acknowledges BTC As Legal Property
data.text: In a recent court ruling, the Shanghai High People's Court has affirmed Bitcoin to be a legal, virtual property with economic value and subject to property rights.  Court Ruling Assigns BTC With Property Rights The ruling was in the context of an October 2020 lawsuit case filed in the Shanghai Baoshan District People's Court, where the plaintiff Cheng Mou demanded that the defendant Shi Moumou return the 1 BTC that the latter had borrowed from the former.
